text: KidsTv.
Bye mom!!!
Hmmm wonder who i might bump into on my walk today.
Oooh i hope i see some boom buddies out and about.
Guess i’ll soon find out…...

As I go walking down the street,
Down the street, down the street,

A very good friend I hope to meet;
Look it’s NICO!
HOLA!!

Let’s clap our hands and stomp our feet,
Stomp our feet, stomp our feet,

Let’s clap our hands and stomp our feet,
Hi Ho Hi Ho…. WOO!
Good to see you nico!
You too, wendy.
Hey, i wonder who else we’ll meet today...
let’s go!..

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Away we go, away we go;

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!

As we go skipping down the street,
Down the street, down the street,

A very good friend we hope to meet;
Look it’s NATHAN!
HOWDY!

Let’s jump up high and come back down,
Come back down, come back down,

Let’s jump up high and come back down,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!
My my, nathan….what a lovely surprise!
Good to see you buddies! Wonder who else is about?
Let’s keep going and find out…..

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Away we go, away we go;

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!

As we go hopping down the street,
Down the street, down the street,

A very good friend we hope to meet;
Look it’s CAROL!
YOO-HOO!

Let’s spin around and wave our hands,
Wave our hands, wave our hands,

Let’s spin around and wave our hands,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!
Fancy seeing you here, carol!
Oh boy am i glad to see you guys!
Hey, now we’ve got 4 out of 5 boom buddies...
Haha! Hope we find one more!

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Away we go, away we go;

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!

As we go walking down the street,
Down the street, down the street,

A very good friend we hope to meet;
Look it’s MARK!
WHAT’S UP???

Let’s all reach out and have a hug
Have a hug, Have a hug,

Let’s all reach out and have a hug
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOO!
Woohoo, now we’ve got all 5 boom buddies together!
Yeah, let’s keep going and see what other adventures lie ahead..
Yup, the world is our oyster, hahahaha!

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Away we go, away we go;

Rig a jig jig and away we go,
Hi Ho Hi Ho WOOOO!!!
